      • getUserSubjects

        public static java.sql.ResultSet getUserSubjects(DatabaseHandler dbh)
                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        A function to find all of a user's subjects.
        Parameters:
        dbh - Get database to connect to.
        Returns:
        Returns ResultSet with all of a user's subjects (subject code and coursename).
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getAllSubjects

        public java.sql.ResultSet getAllSubjects(DatabaseHandler dbh)
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        A function to find all existing subjects not added to a user's list of subjects.

        Used to view available subjects when a user is adding/removing subjects.

        Parameters:
        dbh - Get database to connect to.
        Returns:
        Returns ResultSet with all subjects that a user has not added as their subject.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getCurrentPassword

        public java.sql.ResultSet getCurrentPassword(DatabaseHandler dbh)
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        A function to find a user's current password.

        Used as a confirmation when changing password.

        Parameters:
        dbh - Get database to connect to
        Returns:
        Returns a ResultSet with a user's current password.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        A function to add subject to a user.
        Parameters:
        dbh - Get database to connect to.
